name: SpaceShip: Infinite
description:
SpaceShip: Infinite is a 2d space oriented game where you as a small space ship, have to evade the red missiles as long as you can trying to beat your highscore! This game is infinite, just try to beat your highscore.

iOS: When playing on iOS please ensure you go to Settings -> Safari -> Privacy & Security -> Disable Prevent Cross-Site Tracking and leave disabled if you want to play.

Made in the Godot Game Engine with Kenny Game Assets
